description.text: this message file contains message for [name] package

msg.text: ChipCheck: The WLCSP package of this device is using all four pads(A,B,C,D) at PIC P$$c$$d.
ChipCheck: The WLCSP package of this device only supports PIOs on bank 0 or 2. Comp $$s is not on these banks.
ChipCheck: The WLCSP package of this device cannot support MDDR. Check comp $$s.
ChipCheck: The WLCSP package of this device only supports up to 3 LVDSs on bank 0. Check comp $$s.
ChipCheck: More than one BCLVDSO blocks instantiated ( $$s ). Only one can be supported by the device.
ChipCheck: BCLVDSO $$s does not control any IOs.
BlockCheck: DDR comp $$s ECLK port needs a signal.
BlockCheck: DDR comp $$s needs to be used together with CLKDIV. Signal $$s needs to drive both $$s ECLK and $$s CLKI for bus synchronization. Otherwise, the bus might be scrambled.
BlockCheck: DDR comp $$s ECLK signal $$s must be driven by ECLKSYNC comp, otherwise ECLK/CLK domain crossing cannot be guaranteed.
BlockCheck: DDR comp $$s ECLK signal $$s must be driven by ECLKSYNC $$s output ECLKO, otherwise ECLK/CLK domain crossing cannot be guaranteed.
BlockCheck: Signal $$s of MIDDR_MODDR comp $$s must come from DQSBUFH.
There is no logic for $$s.
BlockCheck: MIDDR_MODDR comp $$s is used as DQS pin, its DQSW90MUX must select CLKOMUX.
BlockCheck: MIDDR_MODDR comp $$s is used as DQS pin, its DQSW90_INVERT must be enabled.
BlockCheck: MIDDR_MODDR comp $$s is used as DQS pin, its DQSR90MUX cannot be used.
BlockCheck: MIDDR_MODDR comp $$s is used as DQS pin, its DDRCLKPOL port must have no signal, now the port is connected to $$s.
BlockCheck: MIDDR_MODDR comp $$s is used as DQ pin its DQSW90MUX must select DQSW90.
BlockCheck: MIDDR_MODDR comp $$s is used as DQ pin, its DQSW90_INVERT must be disabled.
BlockCheck: MIDDR_MODDR comp $$s is used as DQ pin, its DQSR90MUX must select DQSR90.
BlockCheck: MIDDR_MODDR comp $$s is used as DQ pin, its signal $$s on DDRCLKPOL must come from DQSBUFH.
BlockCheck: IDDR2 comp $$s needs to be used together with CLKDIV. Signal $$s needs to drive both $$s SLIP and $$s ALIGNWD ports to perform proper word alignment.
BlockCheck: IDDR4 comp $$s needs to be used together with CLKDIV. Signal $$s needs to drive both $$s SLIP and $$s ALIGNWD ports to perform proper word alignment.
BlockCheck: $$s comp $$s CLK signal $$s must be driven by CLKDIV comp, otherwise ECLK/CLK domain crossing cannot be guaranteed.
BlockCheck: $$s comp $$s CLK signal $$s must be driven by CLKDIV $$s output CDIVX, otherwise ECLK/CLK domain crossing cannot be guaranteed.
BlockCheck: $$s comp $$s must have a CLK signal.
BlockCheck: I2C port $$s of comp $$s is tied to low but the I2C is enabled.
ChipCheck: At bank $$d, port LVDS of comp $$s is tied to low, but the bank has an LVDS signal $$s.
ChipCheck: At bank $$d, comp $$s has its own LVDS signal $$s different from the bank LVDS signal $$s.
ChipCheck: At bank $$d, port LVDS of comp $$s has a signal $$s, but comp $$s at the same bank has LVDS tied to low.
ChipCheck: LVDS comp $$s is place on site $$s. Only the A/B pad pair supports true differential output buffers.
ChipCheck: At bank $$d, comp $$s DIFFDRIVE $$s was programmed differently from the bank value $$s.
BlockCheck: Port LVDS of comp $$s is tied to low internally but connects to signal $$s.
